trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Oakland
There were no other sightings in Oakland on or around October 2nd 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside my house enjoying the beautiful sunny October afternoon when Inoticed a blimp leaving the the vicinity of the Oakland As game , I watched asthe blimp flew overhead and thats when I caught a shiny bright ball about 2degrees to the right of the bilmp . At first it was stationary , but then itstarted to cruise north easterly. I observed it thinking it was maybe a militaryplane or something, I was extremely curious at this point because after a fewseconds it just stopped and it stayed in the same spot in the sky for about 15or 20 minutes , thats when I totally realized it wasnt an ordinary aircraft. Theobject resembled a pulsating star but, in the middle of the day no it wasnt theplanet Mars this was way different in appearance
